definition: agricultural worker/abbr. for 農業工人|农业工人/peasant and worker (in Marxism)
"the four classes" of ancient China, i.e. scholars, farmers, artisans, and merchants

sentences.english: The municipality carried out a policy on agricultural-industrial-commercial cooperation and joint development.
sentences.chinese: 市里出台了农工商共同合作共同发展的政策。

sentences.english: Regardless of soil and the guest arrival depiction of river.
sentences.chinese: 不论土农工商以及江湖之客到来。

sentences.english: That trend is not exclusive to Texas A&M.
sentences.chinese: 这一趋势不仅仅发生在德州农工大学。

sentences.english: My name is Helen. I graduated from Guangdong AIB Polytechnic College, majoring in Business English.
sentences.chinese: 我是庄海婷，毕业于广东农工商职业技术学院。

sentences.english: The farmers put up five tons of hay for the winter.
sentences.chinese: 农工们为过冬贮藏了5吨草料。

sentences.english: If you are not worried about these drawbacks, the PSU will suit you fine.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不担心这些弊端，农工商会适合你的罚款。

definition: Gongnong district of Hegang city 鶴崗|鹤岗[He4 gang3], Heilongjiang
civil transport/movement aimed at the masses/democracy movement (abbr.)
rich country/make the country wealthy (political slogan)
